alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Manatee; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 9:25PM EDT until April 27 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Manatee County in west central Florida... Southeastern Pinellas County in west central Florida... Central Hillsborough County in west central Florida... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 924 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pebble Creek to St. Petersburg, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tampa, St. Petersburg, Bradenton, Pinellas Park, Plant City, Temple Terrace, West Park, Palmetto, Gulfport, and St. Pete Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
